name: Crane Scale
description:
Crane Scale is a game made  for the GDL Game Jam where the theme was "Size Does Matter". The buttons and title Art was made by lightskinbrody. The rest was me ShadowJats

INTRO-Oh no! The skyscraper you were building lost a support beam. You have to catch the falling metal pieces and sell them to buy more height for your crane. Reach 15 height and place the support beam in it's place.

Arrow Keys or A and D keys- Move Left and Right
